text: (enenral) vanankalilum, pumiyilum ullavai (anaittum) allahvukku uriyanave! Unkal manatil ullavarrai ninkal veliyittalum allatu maraittuk kontalum avarraip parriyum allah unkalaik kelvi ketpan. Avan virumpiyavarkalai mannippan; virumpiyavarkalai vetanai ceyvan. Melum, allah anaittin mitum mika perarralutaiyavan avan
